text: welcome to daily video vocabulary and
dose of daily new English phrases and
words brought to you by let's store
podcast.com
Pirlo English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 85 in today's
episode I have a new idiom for you to
fight tooth and nail let's find out what
it means and how you can use it in your
daily conversation to fight tooth and
nail sometimes you use all your means
and resources to achieve something in
your life or you put in a lot of efforts
to oppose someone or something to fight
tooth and nail basically means to use
all your resources to win a struggle so
to overcome a difficult opposition with
someone you fight tooth and nail to win
you give it your best shot and leave no
stone unturned when you fight tooth and
nail for something you will do anything
and everything to get what you want you
will use all your means or resources to
be an achiever or a winner for example
when two countries are battling a war
they fight tooth and nail it means they
use all their resources like manpower
weapons and technology to be a winner
they are even ready to sacrifice their
lives for their country okay so now that
you know what this idiom means let's
take a look at some example sentences to
see how you can use it in your daily
conversation
example one James told Maria what a
tough match
they fought tooth and nail to win the
World Cup example two been assured his
father I'm going to fight tooth and nail
to win the inter-school elocution
competition example three to increase
the literacy rate the people fought
tooth and nail to get new schools opened
in their village example for both the
brothers Peter and Andrew fought tooth
and nail to get a higher share in their
family business example five Michelle
told Kelly if my family disapproves of
my boyfriend I will fight them tooth and
nail just to be with him example six the
senior doctor fought tooth and nail to
revive the patient who met with a fatal
accident he resorted to all the means
like using the shock treatment
example seven in some countries women
had to fight tooth and nail for their
basic rights such as education example
eight richard is fighting tooth and nail
to gain custody of his children as he is
divorcing his wife example nine on a
lonely Street when Jack was attacked by
a gangster
he fought tooth and nail and later
managed to reach the police station
example ten during the promotion of a
film the fans and photographers fought
the security tooth and nail to get a
glimpse of their favorite star example
11 little John and Mary always fight
tooth and nail to get the first turn to
play games on their fathers laptop
that's the end of today's episode have
you ever fought tooth and nail to
achieve something kindly share your
experiences in the comment box below
this video thank you for watching us do
watch all the episodes of daily video
vocabulary to better your English
language skills do subscribe to our
Channel and stay updated with all the
latest lessons I will see you again
tomorrow with a new word or a phrase
till then
bye and take care
